Articles.Content: I've noticed while logging in "connect.facebook.com" appears in the activity bar - among other sites, like alpha.renegrade.net ... why? I've not looked into the other sites the forum is linking(?)/connecting to, which I will (later), but why Facebook? I want nothing to do with Facebook.

Probably for those buttons down there on bottom left (I see four - share on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit and Email. YMMV) It's not necessarily sharing anything with FB at this time, but probably has to load the logo from there

Edited December 1, 2015 by Damien_The_Unbeliever

Hummm... I'm not seeing any share buttons, but then again I've got a browser addon which removes all those buttons. I guess it's working lol.

Edited December 1, 2015 by LordFerret

FaceBook?

That's it... It's the nefarious objective of this change to IPS4... Let facebook demons reach this sacred place... and turn this heaven into hell... >____<

Hmm, on the login page? Most likely because IPS4 has the ability to allow people to log in using various 3rd party accounts. Those options have been disabled though, so I'm not sure why the forums still poll those websites. Will investigate.
To be honest, I would not mind an option to include a link from this forum to my Facebook page.  No, I don't want to share feeds or anything like that... but if we are still linking to Twitter...
